title: Perma-banned
body: Ive been perma banned for quite a while now, and i really miss my acc.... i honestly dont know what i was banned for, i remember using LSI (League Summoner Information) all the time, but its like using OP.GG while in loading screen, i honestly didnt know that i could get banned for using it, and thats probably not it, but still.... Cant i get my acc back telling me a msg for whatever it was that got me banned so i learn my lesson? Ive been seriously dedicated to that acc and have contributed to league a lot and have spent so much on it with a lot of gifts from friends, please give me another chance Riot :/

replies.body: rito pls yes i flame because this ugys is so toxic pls rito give me account pls and i bee better player pls

Hey there,

LSI is currently an allowed program, the developers of LSI worked with Riot directly to ensure their tool fits within Riot's 3rd party guidelines.

As this is an account specific inquiry you'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for further assistance as we here on the boards are unable to assist you.
